attributes.review: I opened the app and it immediately started screaming racist and homophobic slurs at me. Then a scary orange man told me to vote him and then denied being sexual to any young girls. I donâ€™t know who in their right mind would want a tangerine as their president but definitely do not get this app!!! You will, I repeat, YOU WILL have a recurring nightmare about tangerine man chasing you as he screams Racist and homophobic slurs then tweets then tells you he can do what he wants because he is in the White House!!!
attributes.title: Why in the world was this app so bad.

attributes.review: This app made my phone crash and I just got this phone itâ€™s an iPhone 11. And all my other apps are glitching now. This has been happening ever since I downloaded the app days ago and Iâ€™m afraid Iâ€™m going to have to end up getting a new phone. I highly do not recommend. Iâ€™ve seen many others say it made their phones glitch too.
attributes.title: Delete this app

attributes.review: I got this app become I am a gun loving, boat riding trump supporter. Every time I would open the app it crashed! Iâ€™m disappointed and will be changing my party.
attributes.title: This app made my phone crash

attributes.review: Considering the poor choice of other presidential candidates for the 2020 Presidential Election, I had high hopes for President Donald Trump in comparison to a singer with little experience in terms of government and politics. After downloading this application, my hopes deteriorated of Mr.Trump doing anything positive for the USA in these upcoming years. My results were disappointing to say the least.
attributes.title: Disappointing Results

attributes.review: Wow. What a piece of garbage. The app is just mining data and selling personal info to telemarketers and scam artists. Would give a zero rating if possible.
attributes.title: App is scraping data and fishing

attributes.review: this is probably one of the very worst apps iâ€™ve ever downloaded. it took over a week to download and took up all my space in my phone! itâ€™s now getting deleted because no one wants the bunker boy sitting there hiding from the truth behind his disgusting app. i would rate this 0 stars but sadly it just isnâ€™t possible. i thought the app was amazing and would help me catch up on all of our president oranges news but there was nothing useful here so itâ€™s now going to disappear from my phone just as it should  from existence. downloading it was a complete waste of time and i regret it very much. hopefully they delete this and never try again. like the orange with his election! he tried once and he failed so just stop there. anyways donâ€™t download unless you want to waste your time âœ¨ğŸ§š
attributes.title: bunker boy ğŸ™ˆ

attributes.review:
Well first of all. My phone is where I spend most of my time and this app gives off negative vibes to my other apps. My other apps started complaining to me that this app wasnâ€™t following social distancing and wasnâ€™t wearing a mask. This is unaceptable behavior. I just want yâ€™all to know that. Also. Many of my other apps complained about the app because it wanted to â€œbuild a fileâ€ for itself to â€œkeep out the illegal appsâ€ like itâ€™s been here the whole time. It REALLY said to one of my og apps, THE APP STORE (yeah I know they have been here claiming this phone since the beginning) but it came in here and told it that it should go back to where it came from. Wha?? Well anyway hopefully the people will vote it enough 1 stars so it isnâ€™t in office.... I mean on my phone anymore. 

Have a good rest of your day :)
attributes.title: 1/10 do not recommend
